author: {'steamid': '76561198116223432', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1482696755}
review:
The review is quite simple. 
Pros
-World is massive
-Tons of crafting
-Decent character build/customization
-Decent combat system

Cons
-Towns are huge NPC's scattered for the most part
-HUGE learning curve (very small information/play instruction for new player)
-^ This one would not be so bad if the community was helpful in the slightest. (they are mostly troll child like players)
-The game is dying quickly
-What remains of the community is a small few of highly invested players (Vets) who take much pride in killing new players and destroying any hope of this game surviving.

In closing - I have very few hours due to the PK players who refuse to let new players even get into the graveyards (Starting zone newby area, key for learning combat and early farm for gear and books you will need to progress.)
I would love to delve into the game and see what I could achieve but the game death has left the community bitter and troll strong. 
For a free to play I do recommend a try at this game if you enjoy having your first few hours of grinding, crafting, learning wiped out in a volley of super bored vet bambi slaughter. 
Myself, however will be moving on from the title and let it die.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988318267', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7608, 'last_played': 1483078791}
review:
This is likely the best MMORPG that exists at the moment. It stays true to the RPG component of the genre - unlike certain titles that produce highly streamlined, monotonous, instant-gratification gameplay which seem to hand out gear and don't rely on a community aspect at all. All things in the game are player created and player run - the gear, the politics, many of the buildings (castles, towers, etc) throughout the world, even. I must say, if you're a very casual player you may not see the point in putting time into this game. If you are easily frustrated by being attacked by another player, this is not the game for you. If you are interested in a very challenging world where you must learn to defend yourself and your party from any possible lingering threat, where nothing comes easy, and where a battle could break out anytime, you've found what you're looking for.

I would liken Mortal Online to Ultima Online in many ways. The game has a complex skills system which allows you to build a character the way you would like it built, and leveling is much like it is in Skyrim where by performing actions, you gain the levels. The world is a largely open-ended sandbox, allowing players to do whatever it is they desire, assuming they have the necessary ability, and guilds and solo-players alike wage war and create conflict anywhere in the world they see fit. Crafting has so many different levels to it, and you will find that it is best to rely on other characters to fill in some of the gaps that you are missing when it comes to combining components of each individual crafting system (from people who took different skill line paths than you) to produce something greater. Collaboration is very much key in many components of this game, which I think is vital to an MMO's success. 

Some things unique to Mortal Online that may entice you: 
-Mounted Archery (Mounted combat in general)
-Taming of beasts/mounts and breeding of those beasts to produce better creatures
-Dark open world dungeon delves (that anyone might join on or interfere with)
-Graded hitboxes (where you hit your target and what they are wearing there is taken into account instead of damage being weighed against all armor worn)
-Fully lootable player corpses (with the exception of their banks)
-Pickpocketing other players (pay to play only feature, but makes sense)
-Many secrets hidden around the world that can teach your character strange and powerful forms of magic. 

Understand that while the game is free to play, and while free to play characters are capable of achieving plenty, free to play characters are limited to 60% of the maximum efficacy that skills can provide (60/100 effective points in skills is your maximum). I would strongly suggest giving the game a try, since it is free to play, and if you're interested in seeing the heights you can achieve with maximum results enabled, subscribe and join a guild to play with.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998921388', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 119375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99970, 'last_played': 1667480392}
review: Mortal Online... What do I say? Is it fun? absolutely. Is it hard? I can be and definately IS if you go solo. Will yoi die? Man many times. You will lose weapons, ar,or gear you have worked hard to obtain.  Yet you will make good friends, gain items from other players and have fun doing it. Can the community be harsh? Without a doubt. The Devs and Gm's try to interfere as little as possible because the game and world is for the most part community driven.  I have been playing a long time with many hours not on Steam and I have had several hiatus's from the game yet I always come back to it. This is not a game for the faint of heart. You WILL die and lose countless items and money earned. If Hardcore PvP isn't to your liking then this is NOT the game for you. IF being cussed out in the middle of a PvP battle isn't for you then dont play.  You will find all types of players. Many helpful many that just want to take your stuff because its yours, even if they dont need it.  If you DO play don't get discouraged. It takes time to build up and find a group of like mined people.  This game has ruined me for most other games out there. IF the game isn't very similar or at least close it's not worth my time anymore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021371479', 'num_games_owned': 418, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1481365190}
review: Ok so here is my short story. I wanted to try this game with my friend so we downloaded it jumped in and started playing after completing the tutorial he decided to be a warrior with shield and I decicded that I would support him and heal him in battle. This went in interesting ways. Firstly the game would not let me heal him because I was a fledgeling, then it would not let me heal him because I didnt tick the box that I can target blue players. I repeat I wanted to heal him at to top it all off when I finally ticked the box and healed him suddenly a guy with a huge sword came running at me and instantly killed me and then proceeded to kill my buddy. I thought that there was a mechanic that for the first day other players cant attack you until you attack someone else, but welp :D and another thing that both of us encountered when we wanted to chop down a tree. We equiped our axes and came to  tree, we pressed R and both of us got a comparisson box instead chopping wood. Words cannot describe the experience we had playing this game, but numbers can 3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198146348645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 130832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83657, 'last_played': 1668185518}
review:
Odświeżam recenzję.


Myślisz, że potrafisz walczyć śmiertelniku?
Uważasz, że wiesz czym jest honor?
Jesteś pewien, że znasz się na tworzeniu przedmiotów?

Przestań się okłamywać!

Ta gra nie jest stworzona dla słabych graczy.
Tutaj poznajesz siebie, poznajesz swoją cierpliwość, jeżeli jej nie posiadasz ta gra nie jest dla Ciebie.
Grałeś w Dark Soulsa i liczba zgonów Twojej postaci była dłuższa niż Twój numer telefonu?
"Nic nie wiesz Johnie Snow."

Dynamiczna gra MMORPG, masowe pvp, full drop loot, zginiesz czyli tracisz wszystko, nie płacz, uzbieraj kasę, i walcz na nowo!
Chcesz sobie zbudować dom? 
Nie ma problemu!
Zbierz surowce i pieniądze, wybierz miejsce i buduj!

O nie!
Ktoś Cię właśnie zabił jak szedłeś z surowcami...


W tej grze nigdzie nie jesteś bezpieczny każdy może CIę zabić, w dowolnym miejscu.


Wychodząc na przeciw tym trudnościom, zwłaszcza dla nowych graczy, zapraszamy wszystkich chętnych, uważających że podołają tej grze. To nie jest kolejny Hack&Slash, tutaj trzeba poświęcić mnóstwo czasu by coś zyskać, by zarobić golda, nie ma nic od razu.

[b]Jedyna[/b] Polska Gildia na serwerze zaprasza

GIldia Sobieski, w skrócie SLAV

Nasz TeamSpeak - srv2.multigaming.pl:11849

author: {'steamid': '76561198030508080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 435, 'last_played': 1460507231}
review:
Garbage.
Stay away from this game. I had to play from multiple accounts from other friends too btw so I can properly test it as it only gives you ONE character roll at the start. So I have a lot more hours on the game all up.

It is a subscription based game, and does not offer the quality it should for a sub. The game is worth around a single 30 dollar purchase, if that.

Its garbage.

The notion of "it gets better later on" is really getting on my nerves at this point. If I have to spend 100 hours for your "better" part, then thanks but no thanks.

Aside from that, it is an open world RPG, is it not? The site advertises "next gen graphics" and content, and the freedome to do what you want in the game and create your own story.

Nope, you have to be part of a guild. The world lacks any society structure that actually works ore resembles anything of immersion. From the fact that people roam around doing whatever they please (very welcoming, even though I was barely bothered and left alone knowing the system does not account for half the things in the game is sad) to directions been given in exact meters. "The gate is 417 meteres north west from the well, derp!".

Everything about the immersion to this game completely turned me off, and I wanted it so bad to be good I simply could not stand even a single minute longer without ANYTHING of the first dozen of hours giving me some form of interest.

It gets better later on? Hardly worth it, if I am to play 100hrs to get to finally be excited about something in the game, then thanks but no thanks.

As an RPG player, I also would not recommend this title at all as it truly does not give you a role playing sense of rolling a character as you see fit.

The only "hardcore" thing about this game is that others can kill you all day long. This is not hardcore, its exploitation. Street Fighter or a top end fighting game is hard, you need to learn it and it aint filled with cheap sh!t. This is just a pointless experience.

The graphics are the last thing that could of saved it for me. In hopes that it could create an immersion in a world that I could actually love. At which point, I would have stayed longer and tried my way in it. What for though? When even the graphics look like Oblivion and a game from 10 years ago. Animations are clunky, combat is even clunkier (loved seeing "top tier" friends duel each other, they looked like a bunch of unrealistic tarts going at it)... I can't find any redeeming quality in this game other than the artwork and the detail put into the lore (sort of, like the races and all).

The concept of what they were going for is AMAZING. Hence why I tried it out. The payoff, hardly worth it. And all this in a subscription package? Please... No, just... no.

3/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016349261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 24969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16562, 'last_played': 1495066836}
review: I've always had a soft spot for the genre of MMORPG's  but after years of trying the different titles I had sadly come to a the conclusion that no one know how to actually make them anything other than tedious grinding scavenger hunts.  When elderscrolls online was announced I thought it would be the holy grail.  I imagined basically skyrim but with other players. Instead they gave us a cookie cutter shitty mmorpg in a morrowind dress.  Then I tried Mortal online.... all stats, no character levels, or locked skill classes. A vast depth of skills to learn and choose from. Skills that only get better from use.  No lame NPC's sending you on dumb quests to kill 10 rats or badgers or some garbage.  No more diapers children!  Full looting if you die....but there are laws just like the real world.  Murderers and criminals cannot simply kill you in town and of course you can always stash your things safely in the bank.   HOnestly this is the game that Elderscrolls online should have been.   I wish these developers all the best.  I hope this game continues to grow and while in some minor criticism i will say the graphic come off a bit un-polished at times or the world seems a little empty.  The gameplay itself is so rich I only hope they continue to get support so this game can grow and fill out.  HOnestly the most fun I've had with a mmorpg in yearssssss

author: {'steamid': '76561197977650321', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 33778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15161, 'last_played': 1579584196}
review:
There is alot to say about this game. For starters, it is a subscription based sandbox MMO with a free to play system that offers a ton of freedom. This is a very complex, difficult game with many bugs being actively developed by a small team. You can play the game without paying anything and partake in pvp, pve and do just about everything without a time constraint on your free to play time. They do, however, place a level restriction on how high you can raise your individual skills; this game has a TES Oblivion style leveling system rather than a traditional MMO leveling style. You can still be a meaningful part of groups as a free to play charater, but will have a hard time competing 1v1 as a free to play.

This isn't a game for everyone, it is as hardcore as the genre can be and nothing about it holds your hand such as other MMOs will. PVP is free for all and non consentual, and safety is something you have to make for yourself not something the game provides. That being said this game is incredible and as far as I'm concerned, the best sandbox MMO out there. The map is very large and allows players to construct their own houses/keeps/cities in which you can run public towns with guards or control large territories as a guild and charge taxes as landlords to those who build on your territory.

All of the professions are well thought out and require thought to materials used to make whatever it is you are crafting, as well as the things you craft are highly customizable. This includes gathering professions, they aren't just "go around and gather this" you have to refine raw materials through multiple steps to make quality products, and the better your character is, the higher your yields. This leads to a very interesting crafting system that is unparalleled in other similar games. While the crafting system 

All loot is regional, so if you want to transport your goods across the world to be sold somewhere else you actually have to transport them, or pay someone to transport you / guard you during transport if you don't want them to be taken from you. 

The combat is very similar to the game "Mount and Blade" in that attacks and blocks are directional so when fighting someone not only do you have to time your parries, but you have to parry in the direction of your attacker to successfully block. Though mortal's UI and inventory suffers from poor responsiveness and just feels bad. 

All in all, this is a cool game but the developers are a meme and the game is dying/dead. There's one large guild that destroys anything you try to build within or anywhere within their territory, which is most of the main continent of the map. It's largely unplayable and until the devs turn it around (hopefully with MO 2), you're probbably not going to have a good time here as a new player.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037799595', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 35219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15892, 'last_played': 1608767288}
review:
Das Spiel hat einige gute Ansätze, aber das fehlende PVP system ( das was das Spiel hat ist kein PVP sondern reines PK) ein ordentliches PVP System bräuchte zum beispiel irgendeine regulieren vom Spiel z.b Fraktionen oder die einzelnen Völker gegeneinander anstatt einfaches alles haut auf alles weil es geht. Wenn du ein Arschloch sein willst und dich lange genug ummetzeln lässt, kannst du wahrscheinlich irgendwann das gleiche machen, aber ansonsten bietet das Spiel nichtallzu viel.
Was ich dem Spiel anrechne ist sein herrvoragendes Craftingsystem, das ist wirklich sehr gut geworden nicht zu schwer und nicht zu leicht.Aber im PVE hat man zum Beispiel sich teleportierende Gegner, gezähmte Tiere sind bei weitem schwächer als wilde und damit unbrauchbar im Kampf. Und wenn man denkt in einer bewachten Stadt ist man sicher täuscht man sich.Die sogennanten Wachen würden selbst von einer rheumakranken, blinden Schildkröte getötet werden.Eine aus meiner Sicht gute Idee wäre z.b ein PVP und ein PVE Server, respektiv ein einzelnes grosses PVP Gebiet. 
So wie das Spiel im Moment ist kann ich nur sagen, wartet bis genug Leute keinen Bock mehr haben sich verarschen zu lassen und schaut zu wie das Spiel stirbt, weil das ist der Weg den das Spiel gerade einschlägt, da ich kaum denke dass das Spiel sich so lange finanziert da man jetzt schon merkt wie die Serverleistung sinkt da dass Spiel zusehends laggy wird.

mit freundlichen grüssen an die Entwickler,

John Doe der Rabe

author: {'steamid': '76561198077857557', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 22555, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19413, 'last_played': 1514516459}
review:
Hi,
I have given Mortal online a lot of chances, but there is a limit. I have been In Vadda hoping it would be better than in Tindrem. Of course not, everyday I get killed IN vadda and outside. The Guards do not do anything, whatever I am told they are useless. I have lost the motivation for this Game. No PVE value, if you want to be PVP and cause havoc among Players it is the perfect Game. I have a lot of ideas but I don't think this game is worth it. I will continue playing because I paid the monthly sub, but then I will be gone. 
This game is great as it is one of the kind but my patience has reached the limit.
The crafting is great and the combat is also good, but to be killed everyday and not to have a chance to do something seems unfair in my eyes.

regards UndergroundLV

author: {'steamid': '76561198015589908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1602948142}
review:
Всем привет!!!
Когда-то давным давно... я познакомился с игрой Готика 1. Игра меня просто поразила своим миром и взаимоотношениями. Я проходил ее не один раз. Потом проходил все серии игры "Готика". С тех пор я всегда искал данный жанр RPG. Когда стали популярными ММО-RPG я все надеялся найти нечто подобное. И вот на просторах интернета мне попалась данная игра Mortal online. Сперва я думал, исходя из названия, что это из серии Mortal Kombat. Прочитав отзывы и посмотрев скрины, я понял, что я нашел что-то новое, чего раньше не было. Игры по типу LA2, WoW встречалиь пачками, но все они для меня были аналогами с разным пейзажем и NPC.
Скачав игру и начав в нее играть, я окунулся в невероятный готический мир с невероятной, на тот момент, графикой, которая и на данный момент остается на достаточно выском уровне. Чего стоит посмотреть только на закат или восход.
Когда вышел на охоту, то был приятно удивлен, что NPC животные вели себя по разному. Например, когда охотился на кабанчиков одни убегали, другие нападали, бывали и те, что сперва нападали, а потом убегали. Заметил еще такое, что когда был в брызгах крови к травоядным животным было сложно подойти. Тут нет такого, что убив волка из него выпадут штаны, кусок железа или монеты как, например, во многих ММО, в т.ч. ЛА2.
Есть еще много о чем можно рассказать про эту игру. И free pvp (в том числе и в городе), и full лут :). Система крафта - каждый может создать реально экслюзивную броню, лук, оружие, кторого второго на всем сервере больше и не найдешь... Выплавка металлов практически идентична реальности...
Да, есть минусы, та же графика, многим не нравится готический стиль... На первый взгляд игра выглядит старовата, но в этом, на мой взгляд есть плюсы. Поиграв в эту игру 2-3 недели и немного погрузившись в этот полностью свободный захватывающий мир, остауться играть по настоящему адекватные и строгого готического, я бы даже сказал спартанского, мышления игроки.

В общем я рекомендую данную игру всем, кому нравится данный жанр. кто ищет что-то новенькое и интересное. 
Пробуйте, я уверен, что она не оставит Вас равнодушным.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964962623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 108316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50702, 'last_played': 1600050262}
review:
This is a great game, with a fairly long learning curve. It will take some patience. The game is completely community driven. Guilds, weapons, armor, everything (just about) is player created. It is ALMOST a sandbox. Lots of sandbox elements. If you want to swing swords around, or shoot bows, or cast spells in first person, this game is perfect. 

My favorite element of the game is that it is "100% hardcore" also known as "full loot." If you die, all of your gear falls on the ground. In turn, anyone you kill, you have full access to their loot. Assuming you can escape with it!

My second favorite element of this game is that there are ZERO classes. You can have a mage in full plate if you want. Or a warrior class that wears leather and shoots a bow. Or an archer that can put his bow away and stab you with a dagger. Its really whatever you want. You use skill points like credits toward primary skill points. You can spend them however you like as you build your character. 

I would suggest trying the game. Get through the tiny tutorial, and go to the graveyard. Make some money, and join a guild. You won't regret it. 

If you know what Meridian 59 was, and liked it, you will love Mortal Online.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972223128', 'num_games_owned': 237, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1479265393}
review: Feel's like you need a Ph.D. in ... something, to play this game. No good online sources. Game is empty - no one there to answer any questions. The town i spawned in (Toxia?) seemed to be walled off at the top by a player gate (i need a password to leave?). Good job being new player friendly. I was completely lost on what to do. Hey, i tried 3.4 hours long to figure it out.... all while walking at a snails pace. Thanks for autowalk though, at least you threw me that bone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034121321', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2426, 'last_played': 1479923055}
review: Da tirones de carga, graficos de personajes bastante feos, Inicias en la zona supuestamente protegida... haces 3 cosas.. te matan y te dejan en pelotas sin nada... y te vuelves a la zona de inicio para hacer algo de dinero y vestirte y antes de llegar a ciudad te han vuelto a matar y te han vuelto a dejar en pelotas y encima se te pitorrean... si creas una macro para llamar a los guardias te sale error porque no funciona, y si la escribes para matar al asesino... tienes q apuntar cuando tienes que pulsar a Z para apuntar el tio se ha pirado y ya no va.. vamos una puta mierda total. .. y eso naciendo en zona super segura "segun el juego".  que le den ... Ultima Online era muy antiguo pero era 300 veces mas intuitivo y facil de manejar que esta mierda. las macros funcionaban y no habia que apuntar a un tio para que los guardias lo mataran solo gritar guardias y punto.. .. vamos una patata total para abusones ... quien quiera ser jodido sin poder rechistar.. ale logear.. y echaros lubricante....  pq ni a las 5am estais a salvo ni en la puñetera ciudad

author: {'steamid': '76561198050050239', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1478275559}
review:
Fair attempt of an action-based combat system.
Crappy introductory quests.
Non-existent community-based or system-based welcome to the game to set you in relation with people.
Non-existent RP or RP-enforcement mechanism.

Basically, it's just another MMORPG that failed at RP.
Its graphical magnificience, its vast world catch even people who don't care about RP, thus pushing people who care for RP to leave, putting all the elaborated flavor content in obsolescence.

They put a great deal of efforts describing races, but failed to use it in order to promote group creation, by spawning them in their respective city for example. Instead, you just spawn into the mass, beige, without heritage, relation or purpose, incompetent.

Always harsh to realize when you log into a game to evade that your character actually is inferior to you in real life.

author: {'steamid': '76561197973397186', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5645, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4291, 'last_played': 1535737792}
review:
Es como Ultima Online obiamente en 3D y con mejores graficos.
Puedes dedicarte a lo que quieras, desde intrepido guerrero, mago o arquero, hasta herrero, cocinero o sastre, tambien puedes ser domador y salir a buscar caballos, burros, camellos y otros muchos animales y monturas que despues puedes vender, pero cuidado, fuera de las ciudades hay muchos peligros ya que no hay guardia y podrias topar con otro jugador asesino... aqui siempre hay pvp, incluso dentro de la ciudad aunque alli nadie te atacará pues la guardia lo mataria, pero esa siempre sera su decision. Tambien hay quien se dedica a la mineria o a recoger plantitas que los alquimistas pagan muy bien.
Necesitas comer y dormir, tambien si tienes mascota necesita comer, puedes construir o comprar casas, incluso castillos y murallas. Tambien pueden derrumbartelas con catapultas y demas armas de asedio...

En mi opinion un 8,5 de 10 ( 0,5 puntos por los graficos y 1 x no estar en español, ya que si no le daria un 10/10 )

author: {'steamid': '76561198113955675', 'num_games_owned': 38, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 22796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8650, 'last_played': 1588367410}
review: Вставлю свои пять копеек. Фанатом этой игры не являюсь, но обратить на нее внимание стоит любителям хардкорных ммо. Игра прекрасна своей атмосферой, механикой и музыкой, а также темнейшими и опасными подземельями, в которые без факела и пары верных друзей лучше не соваться! Игра бесплатная, так что вы ничего не теряете

author: {'steamid': '76561198014268641', 'num_games_owned': 5, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 945, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 943, 'last_played': 1644108055}
review: скушная игра, графика отстой, много пк у которых уровень прокачки зашкаливает - даже убежать не сможете безплатным аккаунтом умения только до 60 -донатерам 100. при убийстве мобов или игроков мечом картинка прыгает. если моб выше вас он просто дрыгается как епилептик но урон по вам всеравно проходит. в игре рулят мечи топоры рыцари - маги и лучники живут лиш до времени пока доберутся до вашей тушки- и никакая скорость не поможет по причине смешнова урона. на ультра играл - так у меня вылетала каждые 10 минут - у меня 980 ти х 2 и грелись под 60 градусов- игра не оптимизирована. да и очень не понравилось уродские модели игроков ето жесть посмотриш в пати и блевать тянет.  игра очень не понравилась поиграла довольно долго но ничево путнова не увидела.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079506800', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 42670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12298, 'last_played': 1684861723}
review: This MMO offers an unmatchable level of depth. This is a game that you will love at the times of your height and hate at the times you are down. You will win, You will lose, and You will die. Mortal online is a full loot PvP sandbox game with the emphasis on sandbox. There are no quests and no classes, it is only what you want it to be. Want to be a crafter, sure! Want to tame literally any creature in the game world, No problem! Want to be a renowned Pvper and ruin my day, Go ahead! (I will come back for you though). I have never experienced this kind of fun in an MMO before and that is why we play it, MO is simply unrivaled in what it offers. I Stongly suggest giving it a try, but when you do judge it, judge it more than face value. There is an awesome game hiding underneath what meets the eye in the starting tutorial

author: {'steamid': '76561197997071373', 'num_games_owned': 2679, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 651, 'last_played': 1544468537}
review:
Сразу скажу, вам игру запускать не  стоит. 
Побегайте там в какую оыбчную ММО,или еще что то казуальное.Тут жесткая игра которая яростно даёт по щам,все весьма сурово.
+ Очень высокий порог вхождения(наверное все же плюс)
+ Фулл дроп при смерти
+ Тяжелая прокачка аля Морровнид при юзании навыка
+ Очень мрачный сеттинг
+ Хардкор.

Очень хардкорная игра,в духе старой школы так сказать.Вот как раз и этого сейчас не хватает лично мне. Мрачность и хардкор,самый сок...но...НО теперь перейдем к минусам. Все бы хорошо,но прокачка весьма ораниченна,хотя и кажется по первой что тут можно качать овер дохрена,что Енд гейм будет долог и велик,ибо чтоб прокачать мастера на все руки,придется угробить хотя бы 2к часов. Но нет,тут все в этом плане оказалось грустно. Универсала не выйдет,даже через пару лет игры(хотя полный универсал совсем не нужен).Это сильно печалит,конечно мои 10 часов мизер для оценки Енд гейма,но все же. Его не заметно даже на горизонте,его тут просто нет видимо. 
Ну а теперь про стандартное,графон - дерьмо,ну да ладно,хотя можно было бы движок и обновлять.И вот тут мы упираемся во второй самый главный недостаток,катастрофическая редкость обновлений.То что могло бы перекрыть многие минусы,но нет, и тут жопа,уж простите. Ну и плюс корявая анимация персонажей,и вообще механика боя.Хотя сама механика интересная,если грамтно атаковать и отходить то можно ввалить и крутому игроку и мобу,вопрос прямых рук так скажем.Но все равно сделано через зад достаточно все это. Как понял система гильдий и всего с этим связанного тоже слабо развита,а жаль,это же ММО.
- Ограниченная прокачка
- Отсутсвие ЕндГейма
- Очень редкие обновления
- Общая корявость анимаций и криворукость дизайна,я серьезно.

Очень хотелось бы сказать "ДА" этой игре,ибо хардкорных игр очень мало,но минусы слишком перекрывают все это дело.

П.С. В октябре вышел очень большой апдейт с добавлением Некромантов,новых комплектов брони и т.д. Но это все уже не важно,ибо грустно все равно это. 

П.С.С.В игре есть подписка,дающая прокачку в 50% выше,и возможность воровать. Надо ли оно вам,вопрос интересный. Ибо разрыв между навыками будет не малый.

П.С.С.С. А вообще за игрой следил давно,еще когда она была в другом магазине,который закрылся.Но там она совсем сырая была. Хочется конечно надеяться создателей что то толкнет в сторону улучшения игры. Но ОЧЕНЬ сомневаюсь. Видимо проект делается сугубо для себя и чтоб ручеек оплаты был на поддержку сервера

author: {'steamid': '76561197970379595', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1477696775}
review:
For a game based on PvP, ironicly the greatest form of PvP is battling the fatal errors that plague this game, spent more time looking for solutions than actually playing the game,  shame as  looked ok in the longest stable in game time I had of 10 mins.

Would I recommend, put it this way I tried the game in 2010 for a few months, tried nearly 6 years later, and it still runs like garbage with many many fatal errors so short ansrew ....................NO

Further testing and alot of power cycling of frozen/locked up PC, the cause of my problem maybe win 10 64 bit as downloaded mortal to older win 7 64 bit machine and its stable, however its not stable if you turn on features in game options such as 64 bit and DX 11, having to shoot into the dark a bit as with the system crash and pc freeze lock up im not getting to error reports.

AMENDMENT.......Now have the game running, and enjoying the games uniqueness, its without a doubt a niche game, but its free (skills capped to lvl60 bit annoying) so worth a punt if you read the above and act accordingly.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979545253', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 52945, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30421, 'last_played': 1512765626}
review:
Pomimo mieszanych komentaży na temat Mortal Online ja jako gracz, który jest w MO od początku (z przerwami ale jednak ciągle wracam) mogę powiedzieć jedno - jest to jedna z najlepszych gier w jakie grałem w życiu. Grać należy w grupie, samotne granie ma mało sensu i nie o to chodzi w Mortalu. Gra w przeciwieństwie do wielu współczesnych produkcji jest stosunkowo trudna i ci którzy nie lubią się wysilać odpadną na początku ale jeżeli już wsiąkniesz i zaczniesz odkrywać tajniki tej ogromnej zabawki to po tobie :). Polecam gorąco. Jak już zagracie poszukajcie polskiej gildii a być  może spotkamy się w grze :).

Nie znam lepszej gry. Ale uwaga tutaj nie ma questów - questy zależą tylko od twojej pomysłowości i kreatywności.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044024811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2245, 'last_played': 1560635389}
review:
Let me just say that I played Mortal Online for MUCH longer before having downloaded the Steam version. That said, let me begin.

Many people have a problem, or several, with Mortal Online. Some of them:
-"The game is too hard!!!" - Yes, it is. It's probably the most punishing game I've ever played, and I have played the Souls games. It's a matter of taste. If you're a casual gamer, and there's nothing wrong with being one, this game is definitely not for you.
-"It wants you to put too much time into playing it!" - Again, that's true. In Mortal Online, you're not a valliant hero of the day, not at all. You're a mere peasant, a worthless sack of flesh and bones, and you need to actually work on improving your character. I suppose many like that aspect in theory, but not so much in practice.
-"There's no auto-travel and it takes a long time to move between areas!" - I don't like this aspect myself, but it's there to make it more likely for you to get murdered along the way. Don't like the fact that your character is fragile and can get ambushed at any time? That's perfectly understandable, but it also means you probably won't enjoy the game.

And...

-"The skill cap!" - Absolutely. I definitely hate subscription-based games myself. I'd rather Mortal Online cost something like 30 euros and let you play without the skill cap, and you could buy cosmetic upgrades etc. with real money, or something like that. In Mortal Online's defence, many MMO games can't be played AT ALL unless you're subscribed, and you can still play Mortal Online for free if you're that way inclined. Is it enough of a reason to not make me recommend this game? No, it's probably my favorite MMO game of all time.

Those were the cons, 3 of which can be pros, depending on what you like.

What about the "pure" pros, though? Let's see...
-The community. It may seem weird, since you have tons of unfriendly RPKs (Random Player Killers), so why do I like the community? It's not just the occasional banter in the chat, but also the fact that when you get ambushed and slain, you can go back to a town and report the murderers to other, more combat-savvy players, who will then group up and take out your enemies - it creates an amazing sense of unity, at least for me.
Or you can form a caravan with other players before venturing out of town and only hope that they don't backstab you. This sense of constant danger is, in my opinion, AMAZING for immersion!

-The mechanics. The combat is quite in-depth, you have an incredible amount of various skills, you can do anything from cooking to forging weapons, which brings me to...

-(Almost) endless possibilities. You choose who you are. Want to be a great hero? No problem! Want to tame powerful creatures and then sell them and ride some of them yourself? Go for it! Or perhaps you want to be a miner? Can do!... Again, this brings me to another point, this one might be either hated or loved...

-You choose your own story! There are no quests apart from the tutorial part. Maybe one, where you're simply told that you can slay the undead in a graveyard and you'll get some money for it. You're not controlled by anything or anyone. The only quests that you might get are from... other players/guilds!

Also, one thing that needs mentioning: The skill cap, again!

The skill cap can limit who you can be. If you're subscribed, you'll be able to craft excellent gear, but if you're F2P, not so much. You can still be a great F2P tamer or a warrior, though, or just be a bit less-skilled weapon/armor-smith and sell your items for lower prices, to less-demanding players!

TL;DR: You either hate it or love it... and still hate it a little!

author: {'steamid': '76561198176436187', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1295, 'last_played': 1576324198}
review: Game is similar to Wurm Online, it takes few concepts out of it but with much faster character progression (you can be combat ready in few days instead of months or even years) it doesn't feel that laborious and much has better combat althou lack in crafting and building freedom compared to Wurm. It might be unforgiving at times but I come back every time to play regardless of my in game loses. World is huge and you can immerse yourself in it. It has it's flaws but every single game out there has flaws too. Don't rush, enjoy, join guild and you will have lots of fun .

review:
Sounds like a fun game. 

I created my character, named him etc.

Tried to launch; crashed and forced to wait 4 minutes before my computer could respond. 
Tried to launch again; crashed, 4 minute wait. 
Tried lowering all graphical settings, thinking maybe it's straining my pc somehow; crashed, 4 minute wait. 

Grand total time in-game reported as around 20 minutes, but it was all spent waiting for the game to finish crashing.

10/10, best crash simulator NA

author: {'steamid': '76561198073409845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 42771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40495, 'last_played': 1476630127}
review:
MORTAL ONLINE

Ein Spiel welches sich nicht so einfach in eine Kategorie quetschen lässt da es unter der der einfachen Oberfläche Größer und Komplexer ist als es den Anschein hat, und es wird stetig weiterentwickelt.
[ Nicht ganz so kurze Review, kann Spuren von "Spoiler" enthalten ;) ]

Fangen wir mal mit dem technischen hintergrund an, es baut auf UNREAL 3 auf , von daher wirkt die Grafik zuweilen etwas angestaubt/ Klassich/ Retro , Die Maps der zwei Kontinente sind recht groß ( vor allem zu Fuß, auf einem Reittier relativiert es sich schon dramatisch) was die Hardware (Grafikkarte) durchaus fordern kann ( Mein System ist jetzt nicht das Schlechteste aber ich Spiel es aus Stabilitätsgründen auf LowDetail). Der Server läuft "relativ" Stabil 23,5h Stunden am Tag, ca. ne Halbe Stunde ist Täglicher Reboot (wird auch genutzt für Update, etc.) zu Spitzen Zeiten kanns aber schonmal Ruckelig werden.

Zum Gameplay, CharackterBau, und so ...
Das Spiel ist First Person Only(POV) und so wandert man immer aus der Egoperspektive durch eine Mittelalter-Fantasy-Welt.
Das Spiel is "Englisch Only" !!!
Man bastel sich einen Charackter und hier zeigt sich schon die Große Koplexität 4 Hauptrassen mit unterrassen sowie Alter und Größe bestimmen den Rahmen für Körperliche und Geistige Atribute [ im Spiel kann pracktisch alles in diesem festen Rahmen nach oben oder unten geändert werden, nur passt evtl. der gewählte Rahmen nicht aufdas was man Spielen will ], zudem kann noch des Geschlecht gewählt und am Kopf/Gesicht Modeliert werden.
Nun wählt man noch einen Startpunkt. Zu empfehlen sind Tindrem oder MorinKhur da diese einen kleine Starterbereich mit Tutorial haben. Verlässt man das Tutorial oder Startet in einer andern Stadt/Wilderniss beginnt der ernst des Lebens, 
Stichwort  Hardcore Survival , ohne Quest von einem Questgeber sthet man da und muss sich klar werden was will ich eigentlich machen ? [ Wer in Tindrem Startet bekommt diese Frage schon beim verlassen des Tutorial bereichs und etwas Ausrüstung dafür] Wer ein Krieger  oder Schmied oder sonst irgendetwas werden will braucht die Fähigkeiten( Skills) dafür , diese gibs aus Bücheren, bei Tutoren oder learning by doing und so kann es schon etwas Zeit brauchen bis man alle Fähigkeiten zusammen und gemeistert hat (Achtug grenze für F2P bei 60 ).
Mit seine Fähigkeiten und Atributen muss man sich dann gegen die Welt und adnere Spieler durchsetzten um Geld zu machen um sich selbsts und/oder seine Gilde weiter zu bringen. Wie erfolgreich man dabei ist entscheiden die Skills, deren Effecktivität wird dadurch bestimmt wieviele Punkte drin Stecken ( max 100) für Primäre Skills steht ein forrat von 1100 Punkten zur Verfügung. 
ACHTUNG: hier der wichtigst hinweis zu Skills und Artibuten, den deren Efecktivität ist Expotentiel ( ansteigende Kurve nach oben) Die Mitte liegt ca bei 60 und das ist der enorme untershied zwischen "Free to play" und Abo/Sub. Man muss schon richtig gut sein an Maus und Tastatur als F2P um ,bei gleicher Ausrüstung, gegen einen Kontrahenten zu bestehen im 1zu1( oder der muss halt fehler machen, ist auch nicht schwer)
Anmerkung dazu wie bereits erwähnt es ist Hardcore, sprich es gilt das recht des Stärkerern/Besseren, man sollte deshalb immer damit rechnen von einem anderen Spieler getötet, beklaut zu werden und ein Pferd ist auch noch dran ( du kommst aus dem Supermarkt jemand schlägt dir den Kopf ab , klaut deinen Einkauf und zündet noch dein Auto an) 
Aber auch die ergebnisse bei Wirtschftlichen Sachen( Rüstung Scmiede, Metzgerrei,etc.) ist enorm.
So noch kurz zur Welt, es gibt jede Menge Tiere/Monster/NPC zum Farmen deren fähigkeiten varrieren von Babyeinfach bis nur für Profies, deren Intiligenz ist aber eher low. Auch dieverse(teils verstekte) Höhlen/Dungens sind auch reichlich vorhanden.

Es gibt sicher noch meher zu sagen, aber das alles in Worte zu fassen fällt mir Grad schwer.
Mein Tipp, schaut es euch F2P an lernt die Welt kennen mit einem wegwerf Charakter , gefällt es euch macht ein Reroll des Charakter zu dem was ihr machen wollt( sucht Infos über Builds vorher),sucht euch eine Gilde, Baut ihn auf dann erst Abo und durchstarten, auf dem Weg dahin habt ihr euch schon an den rauen Umgang und das Sterben gewöhnt.

Also viel Spaß beim Reinschnuppern

author: {'steamid': '76561198186400113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 19051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4141, 'last_played': 1525364400}
review:
Love it !!! You can be whatever you want to be . Wanna tame pets and cast spells do it . Want to just mine and make armor do that , anything you want . So many caves and open places to explore and no quests or map to ruin it an explorers dream. 
1. Leave town Die to rpk right outside the gate. Try again make it to an area I dunno where run into a guy " Hey sup" Nothing wanna go to jungle sure. Follow to the jungle tame some awesome beasts make lots of gold run to jungle town put loot in bank go back out die to RPK . Go back kill beasts make more money . Guys I met logs off I decide to travel some more, get lost again .... Run into the mountains see mountain spiders and bears and horses  go inside a crazy looking temple . Run into another guy fighting minotaurs . HEY where is the main town GO NORTH HE SAYS I go north over the mountains and through the woods see nothing but Ocean what a sight. I was lost again and it was great decided to go East I ran and I ran from bears and more spiders and water lizards swam across the river and just kept running saw a couple more guys hours later Hey where is the main town " Follow us " I follow 10 min later I'm back in town . So much fun would and am going to do it over and over till I explore it all and tame every beast possible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020275272', 'num_games_owned': 665, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 3759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3300, 'last_played': 1527285585}
review:
[h1]Gameplay Review[/h1]

I'll update with upcoming experience.

Starting out is slow, and the tutors aren't all lined up in front of you. Walking and running is very slow, this game isn't for the lightly seated. 

You have a certain number of hours to make use of the help chat, but don't always count on them to answer questions. Google might be able to lend you a hand.

Prepare to spend at-least half an hour walking between tutors in Morin & Toxai.

If you don't mind losing items, dying will grant you far faster movement. Not to mention, while alive, there are certain, possibly player laid gates, which can't be opened without a password or breaking it, a Herculean feat. 

Any crime besides murder warrants 2 minutes of NPC hostility and not being able to resurrect. Murder warrants 8 hours of it.

Grinding can be repetitive, but sometimes entertaining. 


[h1]Suggestions[/h1]

Will be updated once more complaints arise.

At this time, Mortal Online is rather unrefined and messy, with wooden pathways floating above the ground, messy combat mechanics, a lacking interface, and unimpressive landscaping.

For instance, you cannot click a friend on your friend's list to message them. 

You have to type "/w friendsname".

You have to wait until the first attack animation is finished before clicking to attack again.

Should make it so you can hold/click left mouse mid-animation to prep for next attack.

Oh, and you can't Teabag very well.
developer_response:
Thanks for the feedback!
Will add the click on friend idea to our internal tracker.

review: Started off pretty good until you leave the main city(Tindrem). See the Damn idiot developers have allowed players to build in places that will not let you visit friendly safe cities because there is only 1 route and they put a gate infront of it or they build a huge suspension bridge(developers) the easiest but still time consuming way to get to the jungle from Baktia but again you can't cross it so instead of something that should take you 20 min to get to and back now will take you 8-10hrs of walking yay so much fun that you allowed people to put restriction on where i go  and you only have one option the other option i had were to circumvent a mountain range and back again or find a spot to jump off a cliff into water about 200ft and hope that A) i hit the water and B) i can take the reduced damage from falling then spend about 4-5 hrs of walking back with my stuff. thanks! makes this so much fun i had to delete it. Game concept 8/10 Players being able to Build anywhere though makes this a 2/10 for me the 2 points are for the game concept it really ruins a persons gameplay when developers build something in the game you are suppose to have access to and use but forget to prevent players from stopping you. author: {'steamid': '76561198120281586', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 4864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4478, 'last_played': 1534799927}
review:
Поиграв некоторое время я получил смешанное ощущение от игры.

Что понравилось:

[b]1. ХАРДКОР.[/b] Игра не прощает ошибок. Каждый свой шаг нужно обдумывать, осознавать риски. Обычные 
мобы порвут парой укусов. Большинство игроков с радостью обворуют, ограбят или просто убьют ради 
фана. Плохо кушаешь и не спишь - слабеешь. Носишь с собой ценности - обворуют. Не заботишься о 
питомце - он сбежит (или сожрет). Нацепил новую блестящую броню и вышел погулять за город - 
готовься выкупать ее на аукционе в лучшем случае. Глобального чата нет. Со смертью теряется все носимое.

[b]2. БОЕВКА. Нонтаргет.  Ближний бой с возможностью наносить удары с разных сторон, блокировать и парировать тоже с разных сторон. Система стрельбы из лука, когда целиться нужно ориентируясь на наконечник стрелы, учитывая гравитацию, дрожь в руках и ветер. Магия с подготовкой и выполнением заклинания. Также магам нужны различные порошки (без нужных веществ заклинания не будет), книги с заклинаниями. Попадания по разным частям тела могут вызвать разные эффекты, причем бить рекомендуется по незащищенным частям тела.

[b]3. ПЕСОЧНИЦА С ВОЗМОЖНОСТЬЮ РОЛЕПЛЕЯ.[/b] Строить домики, писать книги, рисовать, крафтить, готовить блюда (например из голов врагов). Придется выбрать свой путь заранее и хотя тут можно развиваться в любом направлении, генетика родителей и характеристики при создании имеют большое значение. Многие отыгрывают свои роли, квестов тут нет (ну кроме обучающих), чем заняться придется решать самим.

Что не понравилось:

[b]4. ДОНАТ.[/b] Свободные аккаунты серьезно ограничены. Можно посмотреть игру, но для полноценной игры все-таки нужна подписка. Уровень навыков ограничен со 100 до 60, некоторые (например карманные кражи) не могут использоваться. Вы слабее в бою, хуже передвигаетесь, добываете меньше ресурсов, крафт хуже. Хочешь ногебать - плати. 

[b]5. БАГИ.[/b] Самые разные и неприятные, от вылетов и зависаний до дырок в тестурах и проваливанию сквозь карту. Вещи в инвентаре могут "исчезать" становясь невидимыми. Поведение мобов трудно передать. Мало того, что мобы хардкорны, так они еще и могут проходить сквозь текстуры и преодолевать горы. Крысы в канализации (из-за круглых стен трубы) бегают  сохраняя вертикальное положение по потолку и стенам, прячась в текстурах от ударов. Один раз я наверное полчаса пытался запустить игру, сначала вылет, потом невозможность залогиниться. Ожидание, когда закончится таймер и снова вылет. У друга с которым играл в какой-то момент вообще пропал звук и пока не появился. Совершенно глупая механика с факелами - они освещают поверхность только для вас, но сосед видит лишь угли и вынужден двигаться в темноте.  

[b]6. Player Killers.[/b] С одной возможность убить кого угодно в любом месте и в любое время радует, но тут похоже это стало основной целью игры. Орды красных осаждают города новичков не давая им выйти, убивая даже голых бомжей. Некоторые города они вообще умудрились заблокировать стенами не давая физически покинуть город.

[b]7. УНЫЛЫЙ МИР.[/b] Малый онлайн, кругом уродливые пустые развалины городов, животные которые стоят на месте и реагируют только на игроков если вообще реагируют. НПС с одинаковыми фразами в разных городах. Похоже идея была во взаимодействии игроков и возможно отыгрыше роли, но большинство похоже занимаются набиванием фрагов. Ну может я просто еще не весь мир посмотрел.

В итоге многие приятные вещи портят баги и игроки. Попробовать можно, если хорошо с английским. Очень жаль. что каких-то альтенратив нет и скорее всего не будет.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962328966', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1443748507}
review:
I`d love to be able to like this game, but I can`t.
It was created on an Engine that was not made to support huge open worlds like that and because of that it limited what you could have in the world in therms of environment... it`s just ugly and i`m not even talking about the graphics but the art is just extremely sloppy and it seems like something that came out straight from Second Life. It`s empty, flat and ugly...

It`s world building 101 mate... you don`t make an enormous flat land...

I`m not the kind of player who will love a game because of it`s graphics... I play many very outdated MMOs, but I can`t forgive bad level design in general. Cities are not supposed to be that big in games nor that flat. Verticality is very important when you decide the elements you are going to put in a scene to draw the player`s attention. Buildings are oddly far from each other and always seem to have the exact same tiled textured repeated along it`s VERY flat walls. People will notice...

Now I haven`t played a lot of itself because I simply couldn`t get past that first ugly barrier but from what i was able to see the game does acomplish it`s main objective which is having a super open experience in which the player control`s it`s own path. The gameplay itself felt clunky to me, but it`s playable, specially for a UDK open world game... that`s an actual achievement in my opinion.

Maybe the level design increases with time since that first starting area was probably one of the first environments they made for the game, but I don`t feel like it`s worth it to go through all of the bad to find something good, but again, apart from the level design and environment art being really low quality, the game itself seems to deliver what it promisses. So while I don`t want to play it, if you can get past the barrier that I could not, you should try this game... I mean it`s free so why not.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009537725', 'num_games_owned': 13, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1473489015}
review: Its not Free to play
developer_response:
It's not, steam put us in that category since we charge nothing for the client.
We have a infinite trial and tried to explain this in the shop where it says:

"Unlimited free trial!
Mortal Online offers a free-to-play mode with a skill cap at skill level 60. In order to unlock the maximum skill levels and fully master your Mortal destiny, a paid monthly subscription is needed, but unlike many other games there are no microtransactions. Unsubscribing will re-apply the skill cap, but your skills will be maxed again when you re-subscribe. Every player gets one free character slot, and you can purchase additional slots up to a maximum of four."

author: {'steamid': '76561198026487522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 11098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2473, 'last_played': 1476408785}
review:
Tough game - do not play unless you are prepared to die a lot at the hands of other players. You will need a thick skin.

The danger is what makes it all worthwhile. To know at all times you are not safe and adds a spice to the game. 
Tthat doesn't mean you can't relax. Right now my crafter is chopping a tree in the mniddle of nowhere while I write this review. I could die at any time to a player who comes along. But I won't lose much and if I get this load of valuable wood back I will have a stock of some of the best wood in the game for crafting.

Crafting is really intricate. A lot to figure out. So far it seems worth the challenge.

My pvp experiances so far have been limited as I'm in the gearing up phase. I've been killed a few times and assisted in a couple of kills. A lot of potential for fun in a combat system much like Mount and Blade - a truly awesome game.

If you start a new character you must choose Tindrem as your starting city not Morin Khur which is held by the main pk (playr killer) clan who have locked the gate. If you do find yourslef there suicide and ghost walk to Tindrem - their is an online map that can help you on this epic journey.

I still have a lot to learn but so far I'd give the game an 8/10. It is also one of the only full loot sandbox pvp games around so if this is your thing then it is worth a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016746108', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1473201853}
review:
Убил пару хрюшек, наелася мухоморов и умер, нашёл свой труп, сделал себе капюшён из человеческой кожи. После того как получил стартовые вещи для игры дальше и мне открыли врата в город, я заблудился в нём, ограбил пару бочёнков, лёг спать в углу у стены и вышел из игры.
Если бы это был симулятор социопата-насильника больного дальтонизмом, то 10 из 10, а так максимум 5, только за то, что там нет миллиона тупых заданий и можно любого освежевать и сделать добротные сапожки из-за которых, кстати, вылетает игра, поэтому минус один игре, ещё минус за громадный город по которому мой герой шёл, будто карлик верхом на улитке. Ещё минус за оптимизацию, ещё минус за то, что этот кусок свежевыжатого, недоделаного раста весит почти десятку, что там качалось? Это супер сексуальное виляние задницой у свиньи? Единственный плюс, что зайку не заставили убивать, в итоге моя оценка... ну вы посчитаете, и игру советую психам и убийцам, потому что то, в каком темпе всё происходит, то как вы обезглавливаете каждую свинью, а так же возмоность покосплеить Луи Антуан Сен-Жюста. Сапоги нужно сделать из всей команды разработчиков, а я пойду делать единственное, что остаётся в голове после этой игры, присматривать подходящий мешок костей себе на моднявый джемпер. 
Всем пока.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982295752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2097, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1485192700}
review:
Mortal Online is a "free to play" HARDCORE adult PVP MMORPG with real-time Action combat game.  It worked, looked good, sounded ok, played ok.  The UI is different from other games.  This game has sandbox world, open PVP, survival mode, first person vision and full loot on kills. 

 You actually can eat other people also in-game, looks like you can walk around fully nude also.  New players get a few hours before "protection" wears off, if someone kills newer players, they are flagged as Criminal and the city guards will attack them.   There are gangs of players in the wilderness that kill solo players for loot.  The skill system is that you read books, that take large amounts of Real time.

Free to Play means create 1 character and can level skills to 60.  This game can be called Pay to Win and Pay to Play since you have to pay subscriptions to level skills past 60 and have more than one character.  P2P character have more advantages over F2P characters also.

Does have extensive crafting, pet training and gathering system.

I found the game rather laggy on my computer, breaks in the sound, with bouts of rubberbanding.

Try it, if you like Hardcore PVP games like this. I suggest you read other reviews and do research if you start playing also.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140619001', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 2388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1098, 'last_played': 1511637884}
review:
O jogo é bem legal no quesito de realismo comparado a outros jogos, mas prepare-se para passar raiva em determinados momentos, quando morrer e perder itens, etc. Depois de upar as skills de resistência, etc tem que pagar pras skills continuarem avançando.
Eu tenho um receio quanto a isto pois é impor um limite na jogabilidade, mas creio que deva ter métodos de pagamento pra eles manterem um padrão de qualidade para sustentar servidor, etc, já que pelo que vi felizmente não há compra de itens ou outras vantagens no jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045504529', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1381, 'last_played': 1613210325}
review:
I made up my mind in a long time. I was relunctant to leave feedback because there are room for improvement, but the neglect have forced my hand. My Steam showed 0 hrs but the game have non-Steam client that I have used for years. So, I trust that you can over-look my 0 game time hours and not see this malicious, libel, but an honest review.

This game compromise too many time. When server population are down, GM and owner of Star Vault make patchs to cater to the old members. when server population are up, they reverse and make patch for newer people. It is always a bottom line for them to bring revenues. They can't please everyone but can't upset their last remaining people.

Lately, the rule about blocking off major content, like the town of Morin Khur, in the game have been flush down the toliet. The rule is there but not enforce in much to disappoint the remaining players.

The game economy operates around butchering and macroing extraction or fishing. Over the year, they banned fishing macro, but the damage for macro is not contained. People who have made their money, kept it. The rule about botting and macro are hilarious because there aren't much different between botting and macroing but they add their opinion just to not upset their old players that will max train their character in 5 days in macroing. Most people who sold lowest price on metal are likely those who macro extraction. In a way, Mortal Online is Macro/Bot Online. You either macro or butcher, extract, and fight in the game.

People have argued for siege mechanic and tempt everyone to siege them. But, in a way, you are sieging their macro fueled asset. In some case, Morin Khur, a blue town like other major game content where the rule about blocking content of the game will get ignored.

So, you play Mortal Online, you can play however you like to play it but understand how much compromise the company will bend to let abusers bend their way of mastering Mortal Online. The future of Mortal Online have been altered by blocking content and doing massive siege which again paid for by macro economy.

Abusers are the richest people in the game. Don't ever forget that! This game need to be re-name as Macro Online where computer program of bot or Star Vault's viewpoint "macro" are playing the game for the player. And, I can understand that macro is allowed and that using it isn't abuse. But, you still abuse the fair gameplay aspect of gaming. In a way, you let steroid change your body to outperform those who work hard. 

A well known player who I don't name have 10 accounts. All assigned to macroing. In a way, Star Vault see this as "revenue" and doesn't interfere with judging on the Ai's level of Macro to make sure it isn't a bot. Star Vault had rule about not having VM running in the game. What kind of computer that run 10 accounts would be able to run macro task efficiently and precisely?

Update:

They decided at the last minute to make boundaries around Morin Khur and Toxaii unbuildable. Although, the change was needed. It came late. It was common sense for any business with online MMORG company to not let player destroy the sandbox fundamental core of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046140796', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 939, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 900, 'last_played': 1473550320}
review:
Here is the list of things you'd expect in a standard MMORPG:
-Leveling
-Gear
-Passable combat system
-Multiple Servers
-Playable Latency
-Solid Artistic Style
-Flush Environments/Ecosystem
-Plenty of monsters
-Player Freedom

From that list, here is what Mortal accomplishes:
-Gear
-Player Freedom

author: {'steamid': '76561197970942300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 12868, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11127, 'last_played': 1491330178}
review:
Nettes Spiel aber leider sieht man hier auch sehr gut, wie es auf der Welt zugehen würde, wenn es Anarchie geben würde.

Kleines Beispiel aus der Realität gefällig? Ihr wollt nach dem Einkaufen nach Hause und unterwegs überfällt euch der Erstbeste und klaut den Einkauf und bringt euch zudem auch noch um. 

Wer das Spiel spielt, dem sollte das klar sein. Derartiges Grundverhalten ist ja mal ganz nett, aber ständig zerstört es den Spielspass. Entweder man zieht immer mit mehreren los oder muss damit rechnen immer wieder abgefarmt zu werden. Wenn einer euch links liegen lässt, heisst das nicht das er nicht später mit ein paar anderen "Freunden" wiederkommt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027073514', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 580, 'last_played': 1472203114}

author: {'steamid': '76561197994208643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 4585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2062, 'last_played': 1505200013}
review:
Basically First Person Dark Souls meets Rust.

Aiming matters as opposed to targetting systems you find in wow (a big thing for me); you aim for the head, you do more dmg. Has taming in case you feel like turning it into pokemon XD

I had my mount before the end of my first week, so not another just run and run game. 

People Will help you, just try to avoid come off as overly helpless; asking how to do stuff shows you are looking to get shit done, but having people hold your hand all day or being rude to those who offer help will cause the obvious; people won't wanna play with you. Even if you need a good bit of help, just show some patience and you'll easily find people willing to help you from giving you free gear to helping you figure out the tricks to making exactly what kind of character you are looking to build

Active community/updates, new necromancy class. Game isn't super graphic intensive (means more players and more frames.... YAY).

Other than that the only thing you need to be aware of is "blue blocking" where people may attempt to run in front of your attack for the sake of getting you in trouble with guards/other players and getting you killed.

If you get a murder count of 5 you go from having a blue name to having a red name, and need to wait for a cooldown in order to lose that status, otherwise guards will kos and other players dont get in trouble for murdering you either.

IF YOU DO GET KILLED IN TOWN, YOU DO NOT NECESSARILLY LOSE YOUR INVENTORY; if you didn't break the law, it is a crime for someone to take stuff out of your dead body and said theif will have the guards shooting lighting bolts up their asses if they try to grab your stuff.

Tinderem is an awesome starting zone; mounts up the hill outside of town for taming, a small little fountain with some wolf's brush to make food for said mounts that is inside the castle city. The really neat thing I like about starting out there is the graveyard within the castle you can go and murder various lvl skeletons/zombies, which drop basic armor and are decent to farm for their heads (about 1 gold for less than 10 min of getting your stats up choppin up zeds).

If you get a little bored and feel adventurous, you don't even need to leave the city, you can just go down the tunnels at the graveyard or go deep in the sewers and find plenty of rats/bandits willing to murder your ass on sight.

I've been looking for a mmo like this for a while, if you like sword play mixed with an rpg setting, this might be the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085311466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 249001, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145488, 'last_played': 1592360511}
review:
This game seems great, Open world, full pvp, full loot, and a great combat system. The game devs are slow to release new things but they are a small team so that's understandable. The only real complaints I have are this is a Pay to Win game and the community is toxic. The free to play option makes it so that you'll never stand a chance so go ahead and use the f2p the first month and then go sub if you contnue to play. The players take full advantage of the pvp anywhere and working for a week to get a resource can be taken away from you in 5 seconds. You can't get people to group up and help each other cause everyone wants to do their own thing but the devs are developing it into a game where you have to be a group or can't get anything done. So you can never get anything done. The game is slowly dying though cause there are alot of ass holes that play the game and they are ruthless in attacking anyone anywhere, you're never safe, never. There are some good people but not enough to make the game great. And there are lots of bugs in the game. Running through the jungle makes you appear to be flying so you can't target enemies, node lines glitch you even with top spec computers there is lag. And the targetting takes some getting used to. 
I'd recommend this game to anyone that has a great computer, and money to burn.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114105869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1441815307}
review: Ok, im gonna review this pretty fast, I have played this game before it went on steam, I have maybe like 50-100 hours in it, mainly I stopped playing because the game is p2w, when you have a free account your skill cap is 60, but when you pay you get the 100 cap, thats the thing I hate about this game, ok money is needed for the game, but why make it p2w, just make it so the people who pay get a faster skill gain, and for those who don't make it slower to gain skill, and keep the housing for the people who pay also. I think that if they do that, they will get more players. Still im gonna recommend this game, because without the cap thing, its awesome!

author: {'steamid': '76561197979155053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4601, 'last_played': 1456625998}
review:
Salut, je recommande ce jeu car il est gratuit pour l'essayer ... mais par contre à partir d'un certain niveau c'est "pay to win".
Sur le papier ce serait le jeu idéal :
- combats dynamiques FPS
- bac à sable complet
- full pvp / full loot
Le seul HIC, et il est de taille :
- les combats sont supers mals animés : aucun impact, aucune animation de toucher ou d'être touché, les animations de mouvement des armes sont pas synchrones avec les hit, pour bloquer il vaut mieux compter dans sa tete que regarder si le gars ou le mob en face brandit sa hache.
Conclusion : bon jeu sur le papier mais mal réalisé, mal fini.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041283717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 30800, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28536, 'last_played': 1476930044}
review:
Open World Full Loot PvP -- the only type of game I can play anymore. Find a guild or some experienced friends ASAP. You won't be doing much lone wolf/soloing until you get a character leveled up. You will get killed, you will lose all of your shit. This game isn't for the casual gamer.

Make sure to do some research into builds and races before you spend too much time grinding your characters. This can have a pretty big influence on your performance late game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147483469', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1471463148}
review: Лучшая однозначно игра в жанре хардкорного ММО. И ненадо приводить примеры слащавых подобий, все это не то. Мортал действительно полноценно хардкорна и дает полную свободу действий. Скурпулезно проработанная механика боя, крафта, пве , пвп. Поклонники слащавой корейщины, финтиплюшек и недотроги кричащие про ПК идите лесом эта игра не для вас. Тут нету места где вы в безопасности, нету GPS подобных карт, нету ТП порталов и подобного шлака , все что вы используете делается вашими руками. Графодрочеры тоже идут лесом (хотя как по мне вполне нормальная графа). Вообщем хотите хардкора вам сюда однозначно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062991740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 38607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31894, 'last_played': 1569431553}
review:
Hallo an alle die wirklich interesse an einem gutem Aktion MMO haben !!!


Mortal Online ist ein ungeschliffener Diamand .. hier und da hat das Game Kanten und Ecken aber das hat jedes Game.

Um es kurz zu beschreiben .. 

Mortal Online  ist das was du daraus machst .. hast du keine eigenen Ideen oder Ziele .. DANN SPIEL ES NICHT !!
Du bekommt vom Spiel nicht viel hilfe ein kleines Turtoriel damit du weisst was auf dich zukommt, aber das wars schon.
Und ja das ist auch gut so .. das Spiel hat dadurch seinen Charakter ..

Die meisten schreiben F2P ist nicht spielbar genau diese spieler verstehen den Sinn nicht .. klar kann man alle skill nur bis 60 NUTZEN aber man kann sie bis 100 trainieren .. 
abgesehen davon ist das game skill basierend .. du kannst locker mit einem f2p account Paied Accounts besiegen .. es kommt immer drauf an wie gut du bist und das ist das was das game ausmacht ..
Viele schreiben .. ich geh aus der stadt und bin direkt tod weil ein spieler auf einem pferd mit einem bogen auf mich schiesst ;) ... LOGISCH  wenn ich zufuss laufe ist klar das ich gegen einen Bogenschützen auf einem Pferd keine Chance hat.
Dieses Spiel ist in vielen Dinger realitätsnah .. was die meisten Spieler nicht verstehen und deswegen rumweinen .. klar verlierst du alles wenn dich einer tötet oder du an einem Mob stirbst .. so ist es halt .. 
Ja und das macht das Game aus .. Spiel mit freunden in einer gruppe und du wirst sehen das blatt wendet sich .. trage Waffen die Dismounten .. dann kannst du auch einen berittenen locker besiegen denn wenn er am boden ist ist sein vorteil weg ..
Deswegen .. dieses Spiel hat richtig potenzial man kann SEHR SEHR viel erreichen und machen da einem kaum bis keine Grenzen gesetzt werden .. 

Die negativen Rewiews sind spieler die  noch keine 20 std das game gespielt  haben .. wie kann man sich da ein urteil erlauben ich selbst spiele schon 500 std und hab noch nichtmal 1/3 gesehen .. 

deswegen wer interesse hat .. mich einfach anschreiben wir sind die grösste Deutsche Communtity  und helfen gerne weiter den Anfangs schweren Start zu ueberstehen..

Es ist kein Carebaer Game ..
